channel.title: How to get rid of these errors:
channel.description:
i ahve one error where it sais java is not recognized as a external or internal or batch file.YES I DO HAVE THE LATEST VERSION OF JAVA....
I found a private server 21 of this and it worked for a day but i never got to sign on to the servers cause when i clicked sign in it just froze that thing.NOW when i go to it it now says main class thng...how can i make the jar file for it, like what do i need to type into my java toolkit to make the right main class file to make this work.thanks! please reply

item.title: How to get rid of these errors:
item.dc:creator: @mrrules mrrules
item.description:
@mrrules wrote:

OK what u do it edit the compile , so you go to your server folder right click compile and click edit erase whats in there and paste this

@echo off COLOR 08 title YOURSERVERNAME Client "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_06\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_06\bin\java.exe" server pause
Just change the 06 to what update of java you have…hope it helps

Read full topic
